overview: Omar lived a life of amusement and wealth throughout his youth years. When he got old and was on the verge of death, the man did not find a family surrounding him. So Omar started looking for a woman with whom he had a relationship during his youth, to satisfy his conscience.  For this reason, Omar intends to assign two young men on a special mission, which is to search for a woman, find a child, and leave all his possessions to him, to die in peace.
title: Special mission
